id: 'SNL's' Pete Davidson mocks candidate who lost an eye in Afghanistan IED blast
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Eric Levenson, CNNUpdated 6:22 PM ET, Sun November 4, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)"Saturday Night Live" comedian Pete Davidson mocked the appearance of a congressional candidate whose eye was destroyed while he served in Afghanistan.Good rule in life: I try hard not to offend; I try harder not to be offended. That being said,  I hope @nbcsnl recognizes that vets don't deserve to see their wounds used as punchlines for bad jokes.
